 1909:     LP2 = spawn(fun () ->
 1910:                         receive Go2 -> ok end,
 1911:                         exit(HugeListBin)
 1912:                 end),
 1913:     _ = spawn(N4,
 1914:               fun () ->
 1915:                       _ = erlang:monitor(process, LP2),
 1916:                       LP2 ! Go2,
 1917:                       receive after infinity -> ok end
 1918:               end),
 1919:     receive {nodedown, N4} -> ok end,
 1920:     ok.
 1921: 
 1922: -define(COOKIE, '').
 1923: -define(DOP_LINK,		1).
 1924: -define(DOP_SEND,		2).
 1925: -define(DOP_EXIT,		3).
 1926: -define(DOP_UNLINK,		4).
 1927: -define(DOP_REG_SEND,		6).
 1928: -define(DOP_GROUP_LEADER,	7).
 1929: -define(DOP_EXIT2,		8).
 1930: 
 1931: -define(DOP_SEND_TT,		12).
 1932: -define(DOP_EXIT_TT,		13).
 1933: -define(DOP_REG_SEND_TT,	16).
 1934: -define(DOP_EXIT2_TT,		18).
 1935: 
 1936: -define(DOP_MONITOR_P,		19).
 1937: -define(DOP_DEMONITOR_P,	20).
 1938: -define(DOP_MONITOR_P_EXIT,	21).
 1939: 
 1940: -define(DOP_SEND_SENDER, 22).
 1941: -define(DOP_SEND_SENDER_TT, 23).
 1942: 
 1943: -define(DOP_PAYLOAD_EXIT, 24).
 1944: -define(DOP_PAYLOAD_EXIT_TT, 25).
 1945: -define(DOP_PAYLOAD_EXIT2, 26).
 1946: -define(DOP_PAYLOAD_EXIT2_TT, 27).
 1947: -define(DOP_PAYLOAD_MONITOR_P_EXIT, 28).
 1948: 
 1949: -define(DOP_SPAWN_REQUEST, 29).
 1950: 
 1951: start_monitor(Offender,P) ->
 1952:     Parent = self(),
 1953:     Q = spawn(Offender,
 1954:               fun () ->
 1955:                       Ref = erlang:monitor(process,P),
 1956:                       Parent ! {self(),ref,Ref},
 1957:                       receive
 1958:                           just_stay_alive -> ok
 1959:                       end
 1960:               end),
 1961:     Res = receive
 1962:               {Q,ref,R} ->
 1963:                   {Q, R}
 1964:           after  5000 ->
 1965:                      error
 1966:           end,
 1967:     io:format("Res is ~p~n",[Res]),
 1968:     Res.
 1969: start_link(Offender,P) ->
 1970:     Parent = self(),
 1971:     Q = spawn(Offender,
 1972:               fun () ->
 1973:                       process_flag(trap_exit,true),
 1974:                       link(P),
 1975:                       Parent ! {self(),ref,P},
 1976:                       receive
 1977:                           just_stay_alive -> ok
 1978:                       end
 1979:               end),
 1980:     Res = receive
 1981:               {Q,ref,R} ->
 1982:                   R
 1983:           after  5000 ->
 1984:                      error
 1985:           end,
 1986:     io:format("Res is ~p~n",[Res]),
 1987:     Res.
 1988: 
 1989: %% Test dist messages with valid structure (binary to term ok) but malformed control content
 1990: bad_dist_structure(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1991:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 15}),
 1992: 
 1993:     %% Disabled "connect all" so global wont interfere...
 1994:     {ok, OffenderPeer, Offender} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 1995:     {ok, VictimPeer, Victim} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 1996:     start_node_monitors([Offender,Victim]),
 1997:     Parent = self(),
 1998:     P = spawn(Victim,
 1999:               fun () ->
 2000:                       process_flag(trap_exit,true),
 2001:                       Parent ! {self(), started},
 2002:                       receive check_msgs -> ok end,
 2003:                       bad_dist_struct_check_msgs([one,
 2004:                                                   two]),
 2005:                       Parent ! {self(), messages_checked},
 2006:                       receive done -> ok end
 2007:               end),
 2008:     receive {P, started} -> ok end,
 2009:     pong = rpc:call(Victim, net_adm, ping, [Offender]),
 2010:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2011:     true = lists:member(Offender, rpc:call(Victim, erlang, nodes, [])),
 2012:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2013:     P ! one,
 2014:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_MONITOR_P_EXIT,'replace',P,normal},2),
 2015: 
 2016:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2017:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_MONITOR_P_EXIT,'replace',P,normal,normal},2),
 2018: 
 2019:     start_link(Offender,P),
 2020:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_LINK},0),
 2021: 
 2022:     start_link(Offender,P),
 2023:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_UNLINK,'replace'},2),
 2024: 
 2025:     start_link(Offender,P),
 2026:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_UNLINK,'replace',make_ref()},2),
 2027: 
 2028:     start_link(Offender,P),
 2029:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_UNLINK,make_ref(),P},0),
 2030: 
 2031:     start_link(Offender,P),
 2032:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_UNLINK,normal,normal},0),
 2033: 
 2034:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2035:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_MONITOR_P,'replace',P},2),
 2036: 
 2037:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2038:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_MONITOR_P,'replace',P,normal},2),
 2039: 
 2040:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2041:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_DEMONITOR_P,'replace',P},2),
 2042: 
 2043:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2044:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_DEMONITOR_P,'replace',P,normal},2),
 2045: 
 2046:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT,'replace',P},2),
 2047:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT,make_ref(),normal,normal},0),
 2048:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT_TT,'replace',token,P},2),
 2049:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT_TT,make_ref(),token,normal,normal},0),
 2050:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT2,'replace',P},2),
 2051:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT2,make_ref(),normal,normal},0),
 2052:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT2_TT,'replace',token,P},2),
 2053:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_EXIT2_TT,make_ref(),token,normal,normal},0),
 2054:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_GROUP_LEADER,'replace'},2),
 2055:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_GROUP_LEADER,'replace','atomic'},2),
 2056:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_GROUP_LEADER,'replace',P},0),
 2057:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_REG_SEND_TT,'replace','',name},2,{message}),
 2058:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_REG_SEND_TT,'replace','',name,token},0,{message}),
 2059:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_REG_SEND,'replace',''},2,{message}),
 2060:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_REG_SEND,'replace','',P},0,{message}),
 2061:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_REG_SEND,'replace','',name},0,{message}),
 2062:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_REG_SEND,'replace','',name,{token}},2,{message}),
 2063:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_SEND_TT,'',P},0,{message}),
 2064:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_SEND_TT,'',name,token},0,{message}),
 2065:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_SEND,''},0,{message}),
 2066:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_SEND,'',name},0,{message}),
 2067:     send_bad_structure(Offender, P,{?DOP_SEND,'',P,{token}},0,{message}),
 2068:     P ! two,
 2069:     P ! check_msgs,
 2070:     receive
 2071:         {P, messages_checked} -> ok
 2072:     after 5000 ->
 2073:               exit(victim_is_dead)
 2074:     end,
 2075: 
 2076:     {message_queue_len, 0}
 2077:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2078: 
 2079:     unlink(P),
 2080:     P ! done,
 2081:     peer_stop(OffenderPeer, Offender),
 2082:     peer_stop(VictimPeer, Victim),
 2083:     ok.
 2084: 
 2085: %% Test various dist fragmentation errors
 2086: bad_dist_fragments(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2087:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 15}),
 2088: 
 2089:     %% Disabled "connect all" so global wont interfere...
 2090:     {ok, OffenderPeer, Offender} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2091:     {ok, VictimPeer, Victim} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2092: 
 2093:     Msg = iolist_to_binary(dmsg_ext(lists:duplicate(255,255))),
 2094: 
 2095:     start_node_monitors([Offender,Victim]),
 2096:     Parent = self(),
 2097:     P = spawn(Victim,
 2098:               fun () ->
 2099:                       process_flag(trap_exit,true),
 2100:                       Parent ! {self(), started},
 2101:                       receive check_msgs -> ok end,
 2102:                       bad_dist_struct_check_msgs([one,
 2103:                                                   two]),
 2104:                       Parent ! {self(), messages_checked},
 2105:                       receive done -> ok end
 2106:               end),
 2107:     receive {P, started} -> ok end,
 2108:     pong = rpc:call(Victim, net_adm, ping, [Offender]),
 2109:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2110:     true = lists:member(Offender, rpc:call(Victim, erlang, nodes, [])),
 2111:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2112:     P ! one,
 2113: 
 2114:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2115:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, P,{?DOP_SEND,?COOKIE,P},3,
 2116:                       [{frg, 1, binary:part(Msg, 10,byte_size(Msg)-10)}]),
 2117: 
 2118:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2119:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, P,{?DOP_SEND,?COOKIE,P},3,
 2120:                       [{hdr, 3, binary:part(Msg, 0,10)},
 2121:                        {frg, 1, binary:part(Msg, 10,byte_size(Msg)-10)}]),
 2122: 
 2123:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2124:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, P,{?DOP_SEND,?COOKIE,P},3,
 2125:                       [{hdr, 3, binary:part(Msg, 0,10)},
 2126:                        {hdr, 3, binary:part(Msg, 0,10)}]),
 2127: 
 2128:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2129:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, P,{?DOP_SEND,?COOKIE,P,broken},3,
 2130:                       [{hdr, 1, binary:part(Msg, 10,byte_size(Msg)-10)}]),
 2131: 
 2132:     start_monitor(Offender,P),
 2133:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, P,{?DOP_SEND,?COOKIE,P},3,
 2134:                       [{hdr, 3, binary:part(Msg, 10,byte_size(Msg)-10)},
 2135:                        close]),
 2136: 
 2137:     ExitVictim = spawn(Victim, fun() ->
 2138:                                        receive
 2139:                                            {link, Proc} ->
 2140:                                                link(Proc),
 2141:                                                Parent ! {self(), linked}
 2142:                                        end,
 2143:                                        receive ok -> ok end
 2144:                                end),
 2145:     OP1 = start_link(Offender,ExitVictim),
 2146:     ExitVictim ! {link, OP1},
 2147:     receive {ExitVictim, linked} -> ok end,
 2148:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, ExitVictim,{?DOP_PAYLOAD_EXIT,OP1,ExitVictim},0,
 2149:                       [{hdr, 1, [131]}]),
 2150: 
 2151:     Exit2Victim = spawn(Victim, fun() -> receive ok -> ok end end),
 2152:     {OP2, _} = start_monitor(Offender,Exit2Victim),
 2153:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, Exit2Victim,{?DOP_PAYLOAD_EXIT2,OP2,Exit2Victim},0,
 2154:                       [{hdr, 1, [132]}]),
 2155: 
 2156:     DownVictim = spawn(Victim, fun() ->
 2157:                                        receive
 2158:                                            {monitor, Proc} ->
 2159:                                                DR = erlang:monitor(process, Proc),
 2160:                                                Parent ! {self(), DR}
 2161:                                        end,
 2162:                                        Parent ! {self, DR},
 2163:                                        receive ok -> ok end
 2164:                                end),
 2165:     {OP3, _} = start_monitor(Offender,DownVictim),
 2166:     DownVictim ! {monitor, OP3},
 2167:     DownRef = receive {DownVictim, DR} -> DR end,
 2168:     send_bad_fragments(Offender, Victim, DownVictim,{?DOP_PAYLOAD_MONITOR_P_EXIT,OP3,DownVictim,DownRef},0,
 2169:                       [{hdr, 1, [133]}]),
 2170: 
 2171:     P ! two,
 2172:     P ! check_msgs,
 2173:     receive
 2174:         {P, messages_checked} -> ok
 2175:     after 5000 ->
 2176:               exit(victim_is_dead)
 2177:     end,
 2178: 
 2179:     {message_queue_len, 0}
 2180:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2181: 
 2182:     unlink(P),
 2183:     P ! done,
 2184:     peer_stop(OffenderPeer, Offender),
 2185:     peer_stop(VictimPeer, Victim),
 2186:     ok.
 2187: 
 2188: dmsg_frag_hdr(Frag) ->
 2189:     dmsg_frag_hdr(erlang:phash2(self()), Frag).
 2190: dmsg_frag_hdr(Seq, Frag) ->
 2191:     [131, $E, uint64_be(Seq), uint64_be(Frag), 0].
 2192: 
 2193: dmsg_frag(Frag) ->
 2194:     dmsg_frag(erlang:phash2(self()), Frag).
 2195: dmsg_frag(Seq, Frag) ->
 2196:     [131, $F, uint64_be(Seq), uint64_be(Frag)].
 2197: 
 2198: send_bad_fragments(Offender,VictimNode,Victim,Ctrl,WhereToPutSelf,Fragments) ->
 2199:     Parent = self(),
 2200:     Done = make_ref(),
 2201:     ct:pal("Send: ~p",[Fragments]),
 2202:     spawn_link(Offender,
 2203:           fun () ->
 2204:                   Node = node(Victim),
 2205:                   pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
 2206:                   erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
 2207:                   DCtrl = dctrl(Node),
 2208:                   Ctrl1 = case WhereToPutSelf of
 2209:                              0 ->
 2210:                                  Ctrl;
 2211:                              N when N > 0 ->
 2212:                                  setelement(N,Ctrl,self())
 2213:                          end,
 2214: 
 2215:                   FragData = [case Type of
 2216:                                   hdr ->
 2217:                                       [dmsg_frag_hdr(FragId),
 2218:                                        dmsg_ext(Ctrl1), FragPayload];
 2219:                                   frg ->
 2220:                                       [dmsg_frag(FragId), FragPayload]
 2221:                               end || {Type, FragId, FragPayload} <- Fragments],
 2222: 
 2223:                   receive {nodedown, Node} -> exit("premature nodedown")
 2224:                   after 10 -> ok
 2225:                   end,
 2226: 
 2227:                   [ dctrl_send(DCtrl, D) || D <- FragData ],
 2228:                   [ erlang:port_close(DCtrl) || close <- Fragments],
 2229: 
 2230:                   receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok
 2231:                   after 5000 -> exit("missing nodedown")
 2232:                   end,
 2233:                   Parent ! {FragData,Done}
 2234:           end),
 2235:     receive
 2236:         {WhatSent,Done} ->
 2237:             io:format("Offender sent ~p~n",[WhatSent]),
 2238:             verify_nc(VictimNode),
 2239:             ok
 2240:     after 7000 ->
 2241:               exit(unable_to_send)
 2242:     end.
 2243: 
 2244: bad_dist_ext_receive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2245:     %% Disabled "connect all" so global wont interfere...
 2246:     {ok, OffenderPeer, Offender} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2247:     {ok, VictimPeer, Victim} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2248:     start_node_monitors([Offender,Victim]),
 2249: 
 2250:     Parent = self(),
 2251: 
 2252:     P = spawn_link(Victim,
 2253:                    fun () ->
 2254:                            Parent ! {self(), started},
 2255:                            receive check_msgs -> ok end,
 2256:                            bad_dist_ext_check_msgs([one,
 2257:                                                     two,
 2258:                                                     three]),
 2259:                            Parent ! {self(), messages_checked},
 2260:                            receive done -> ok end
 2261:                    end),
 2262: 
 2263:     receive {P, started} -> ok end,
 2264:     pong = rpc:call(Victim, net_adm, ping, [Offender]),
 2265:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2266:     true = lists:member(Offender, rpc:call(Victim, erlang, nodes, [])),
 2267:     P ! one,
 2268:     send_bad_msg(Offender, P),
 2269:     P ! two,
 2270:     verify_down(Offender, connection_closed, Victim, killed),
 2271:     {message_queue_len, 2}
 2272:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2273: 
 2274:     Suspended = make_ref(),
 2275:     S = spawn(Victim,
 2276:               fun () ->
 2277:                       erlang:suspend_process(P),
 2278:                       Parent ! Suspended,
 2279:                       receive after infinity -> ok end
 2280:               end),
 2281:     MS = erlang:monitor(process, S),
 2282:     receive Suspended -> ok end,
 2283:     pong = rpc:call(Victim, net_adm, ping, [Offender]),
 2284:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2285:     true = lists:member(Offender, rpc:call(Victim, erlang, nodes, [])),
 2286:     send_bad_msgs(Offender, P, 5),
 2287:     true = lists:member(Offender, rpc:call(Victim, erlang, nodes, [])),
 2288:     P ! three,
 2289:     send_bad_msgs(Offender, P, 5),
 2290: 
 2291:     %% Make sure bad msgs has reached Victim
 2292:     rpc:call(Offender, rpc, call, [Victim, erlang, node, []]),
 2293: 
 2294:     verify_still_up(Offender, Victim),
 2295:     {message_queue_len, 13}
 2296:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2297: 
 2298:     exit(S, bang),
 2299:     receive {'DOWN', MS, process, S, bang} -> ok end,
 2300:     verify_down(Offender, connection_closed, Victim, killed),
 2301:     {message_queue_len, 3}
 2302:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2303: 
 2304:     P ! check_msgs,
 2305:     receive {P, messages_checked} -> ok end,
 2306: 
 2307:     {message_queue_len, 0}
 2308:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2309: 
 2310:     P ! done,
 2311:     unlink(P),
 2312:     verify_no_down(Offender, Victim),
 2313:     peer_stop(OffenderPeer, Offender),
 2314:     peer_stop(VictimPeer, Victim).
 2315:

 2360:      {messages, [one, two]}]
 2361:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, [message_queue_len,
 2362:                                                   messages]]),
 2363:     verify_down(Offender, connection_closed, Victim, killed),
 2364:

 2371:

 2373:     unlink(P),
 2374:     verify_no_down(Offender, Victim),
 2375:     peer_stop(OffenderPeer, Offender),

 2398: bad_dist_ext_connection_id(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2399:     %% Disabled "connect all" so global wont interfere...
 2400:     {ok, OffenderPeer, Offender} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2401:     {ok, VictimPeer, Victim} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2402:     start_node_monitors([Offender,Victim]),
 2403: 
 2404:     Parent = self(),
 2405:     P = spawn_link(Victim,
 2406:                    fun () ->
 2407:                            Parent ! {self(), started},
 2408:                            receive check_msgs -> ok end,
 2409:                            bad_dist_ext_check_msgs([]),
 2410:                            Parent ! {self(), messages_checked},
 2411:                            receive done -> ok end
 2412:                    end),
 2413: 
 2414:     receive {P, started} -> ok end,
 2415:     Suspended = make_ref(),
 2416:     S = spawn(Victim,
 2417:               fun () ->
 2418:                       erlang:suspend_process(P),
 2419:                       Parent ! Suspended,
 2420:                       receive after infinity -> ok end
 2421:               end),
 2422:     MS = erlang:monitor(process, S),
 2423:     receive Suspended -> ok end,
 2424:     pong = rpc:call(Victim, net_adm, ping, [Offender]),
 2425:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2426:     send_bad_msg(Offender, P),
 2427: 
 2428:     %% Make sure bad msg has reached Victim
 2429:     rpc:call(Offender, rpc, call, [Victim, erlang, node, []]),
 2430: 
 2431:     {message_queue_len, 1}
 2432:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2433: 
 2434:     true = rpc:call(Offender, net_kernel, disconnect, [Victim]),
 2435:     verify_down(Offender, disconnect, Victim, connection_closed),
 2436:     pong = rpc:call(Offender, net_adm, ping, [Victim]),
 2437: 
 2438:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2439:     %% We have a new connection between Offender and Victim, bad message
 2440:     %% should not bring it down.
 2441: 
 2442:     {message_queue_len, 1}
 2443:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2444: 
 2445:     exit(S, bang),
 2446:     receive {'DOWN', MS, process, S, bang} -> ok end,
 2447:     %% Wait for a while (if the connection is taken down it might take a
 2448:     %% while).
 2449:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 2450:     verify_still_up(Offender, Victim),
 2451: 
 2452:     P ! check_msgs,
 2453:     receive {P, messages_checked} -> ok end,
 2454: 
 2455:     {message_queue_len, 0}
 2456:     = rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, message_queue_len]),
 2457: 
 2458:     verify_still_up(Offender, Victim),
 2459:     P ! done,
 2460:     unlink(P),
 2461:     verify_no_down(Offender, Victim),
 2462:     peer_stop(OffenderPeer, Offender),
 2463:     peer_stop(VictimPeer, Victim).
 2464: 
 2465: %% OTP-14661: Bad message is discovered by erts_msg_attached_data_size
 2466: bad_dist_ext_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2467:     %% Disabled "connect all" so global wont interfere...
 2468:     {ok, OffenderPeer, Offender} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2469:     {ok, VictimPeer, Victim} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2470:     start_node_monitors([Offender,Victim]),
 2471: 
 2472:     Parent = self(),
 2473:     P = spawn_opt(Victim,
 2474:                    fun () ->
 2475:                            Parent ! {self(), started},
 2476:                            receive check_msgs -> ok end,  %% DID CRASH HERE
 2477:                            bad_dist_ext_check_msgs([one]),
 2478:                            Parent ! {self(), messages_checked}
 2479:                    end,
 2480:                  [link,
 2481:                   %% on_heap to force total_heap_size to inspect msg queue
 2482:                   {message_queue_data, on_heap}]),
 2483: 
 2484:     receive {P, started} -> ok end,
 2485:     P ! one,
 2486: 
 2487:     Suspended = make_ref(),
 2488:     S = spawn(Victim,
 2489:               fun () ->
 2490:                       erlang:suspend_process(P),
 2491:                       Parent ! Suspended,
 2492:                       receive after infinity -> ok end
 2493:               end),
 2494: 
 2495:     receive Suspended -> ok end,
 2496:     pong = rpc:call(Victim, net_adm, ping, [Offender]),
 2497:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2498:     send_bad_msgs(Offender, P, 1, dmsg_bad_tag()),
 2499: 
 2500:     %% Make sure bad msgs has reached Victim
 2501:     rpc:call(Offender, rpc, call, [Victim, erlang, node, []]),
 2502: 
 2503:     verify_still_up(Offender, Victim),
 2504: 
 2505:     %% Let process_info(P, total_heap_size) find bad msg and disconnect
 2506:     rpc:call(Victim, erlang, process_info, [P, total_heap_size]),
 2507: 
 2508:     verify_down(Offender, connection_closed, Victim, killed),
 2509: 
 2510:     P ! check_msgs,
 2511:     exit(S, bang),  % resume Victim
 2512:     receive {P, messages_checked} -> ok end,
 2513: 
 2514:     unlink(P),
 2515:     verify_no_down(Offender, Victim),
 2516:     peer_stop(OffenderPeer, Offender),
 2517:     peer_stop(VictimPeer, Victim).
 2518: 
 2519: bad_dist_ext_spawn_request_arg_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2520:     {ok, OffenderPeer, Offender} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2521:     {ok, VictimPeer, Victim} = ?CT_PEER(["-connect_all", "false"]),
 2522:     Parent = self(),
 2523:     start_node_monitors([Offender,Victim]),
 2524:     SuccessfulSpawn = make_ref(),
 2525:     BrokenSpawn = make_ref(),
 2526:     P = spawn_link(
 2527:           Offender,
 2528:           fun () ->
 2529:                   ReqId1 = make_ref(),
 2530:                   dctrl_dop_spawn_request(Victim, ReqId1, self(), group_leader(),
 2531:                                           {erlang, send, 2}, [],
 2532:                                           dmsg_ext([self(), SuccessfulSpawn])),
 2533:                   receive SuccessfulSpawn -> Parent ! SuccessfulSpawn end,
 2534:                   receive BrokenSpawn -> ok end,
 2535:                   ReqId2 = make_ref(),
 2536:                   dctrl_dop_spawn_request(Victim, ReqId2, self(), group_leader(),
 2537:                                           {erlang, send, 2}, [],
 2538:                                           dmsg_bad_atom_cache_ref()),
 2539:                   Parent ! BrokenSpawn,
 2540:                   receive after infinity -> ok end
 2541:           end),
 2542:     receive SuccessfulSpawn -> ok end,
 2543:     verify_up(Offender, Victim),
 2544:     P ! BrokenSpawn,
 2545:     receive BrokenSpawn -> ok end,
 2546:     verify_down(Offender, connection_closed, Victim, killed),
 2547:     [] = erpc:call(
 2548:            Victim,
 2549:            fun () ->
 2550:                    lists:filter(
 2551:                      fun (Proc) ->
 2552:                              case process_info(Proc, current_function) of
 2553:                                  {current_function,
 2554:                                   {erts_internal, dist_spawn_init, 1}} ->
 2555:                                      true;
 2556:                                  _ ->
 2557:                                      false
 2558:                              end
 2559:                      end,
 2560:                      processes())
 2561:            end),
 2562:     unlink(P),
 2563:     peer:stop(OffenderPeer),
 2564:     peer:stop(VictimPeer),
 2565:     ok.
 2566: 
 2567: bad_dist_struct_check_msgs([]) ->
 2568:     receive
 2569:         Msg ->
 2570:             exit({unexpected_message, Msg})
 2571:     after 0 ->
 2572:               ok
 2573:     end;
 2574: bad_dist_struct_check_msgs([M|Ms]) ->
 2575:     receive
 2576:         {'EXIT',_,_} = EM ->
 2577:             io:format("Ignoring exit message: ~p~n",[EM]),
 2578:             bad_dist_struct_check_msgs([M|Ms]);
 2579:         Msg ->
 2580:             M = Msg,
 2581:             bad_dist_struct_check_msgs(Ms)
 2582:     end.
 2583: bad_dist_ext_check_msgs([]) ->
 2584:     receive
 2585:         Msg ->
 2586:             exit({unexpected_message, Msg})
 2587:     after 0 ->
 2588:               ok
 2589:     end;
 2590: bad_dist_ext_check_msgs([M|Ms]) ->
 2591:     receive
 2592:         Msg ->
 2593:             M = Msg,
 2594:             bad_dist_ext_check_msgs(Ms)
 2595:     end.
 2596: 
 2597: ensure_dctrl(Node) ->
 2598:     case dctrl(Node) of
 2599:         undefined ->
 2600:             pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
 2601:             dctrl(Node);
 2602:         DCtrl ->
 2603:             DCtrl
 2604:     end.
 2605: 
 2606: dctrl_send(DPrt, Data) when is_port(DPrt) ->
 2607:     port_command(DPrt, Data);
 2608: dctrl_send(DPid, Data) when is_pid(DPid) ->
 2609:     Ref = make_ref(),
 2610:     DPid ! {send, self(), Ref, Data},
 2611:     receive {Ref, Res} -> Res end.
 2612: 
 2613: dctrl_dop_reg_send(Node, Name, Msg) ->
 2614:     dctrl_send(ensure_dctrl(Node),
 2615:                [dmsg_hdr(),
 2616:                 dmsg_ext({?DOP_REG_SEND,
 2617:                           self(),
 2618:                           ?COOKIE,
 2619:                           Name}),
 2620:                 dmsg_ext(Msg)]).
 2621: 
 2622: dctrl_dop_send(To, Msg) ->
 2623:     Node = node(To),
 2624:     dctrl_send(ensure_dctrl(Node),
 2625:                [dmsg_hdr(),
 2626:                 dmsg_ext({?DOP_SEND, ?COOKIE, To}),
 2627:                 dmsg_ext(Msg)]).
 2628: 
 2629: dctrl_dop_spawn_request(Node, ReqId, From, GL, MFA, OptList, ArgListExt) ->
 2630:     %% {29, ReqId, From, GroupLeader, {Module, Function, Arity}, OptList}
 2631:     %%
 2632:     %% Followed by ArgList.
 2633:     dctrl_send(ensure_dctrl(Node),
 2634:                [dmsg_hdr(),
 2635:                 dmsg_ext({?DOP_SPAWN_REQUEST, ReqId, From, GL, MFA, OptList}),
 2636:                 ArgListExt]).
 2637: 
 2638: send_bad_structure(Offender,Victim,Bad,WhereToPutSelf) ->
 2639:     send_bad_structure(Offender,Victim,Bad,WhereToPutSelf,[]).
 2640: send_bad_structure(Offender,Victim,Bad,WhereToPutSelf,PayLoad) ->
 2641:     Parent = self(),
 2642:     Done = make_ref(),
 2643:     spawn_link(Offender,
 2644:           fun () ->
 2645:                   Node = node(Victim),
 2646:                   pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
 2647:                   erlang:monitor_node(Node, true),
 2648:                   DCtrl = dctrl(Node),
 2649:                   Bad1 = case WhereToPutSelf of
 2650:                              0 ->
 2651:                                  Bad;
 2652:                              N when N > 0 ->
 2653:                                  setelement(N,Bad,self())
 2654:                          end,
 2655:                   DData = [dmsg_hdr(),
 2656:                            dmsg_ext(Bad1)] ++
 2657:                   case PayLoad of
 2658:                       [] -> [];
 2659:                       _Other -> [dmsg_ext(PayLoad)]
 2660:                   end,
 2661: 
 2662:                   receive {nodedown, Node} -> exit("premature nodedown")
 2663:                   after 10 -> ok
 2664:                   end,
 2665: 
 2666:                   dctrl_send(DCtrl, DData),
 2667: 
 2668:                   receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok
 2669:                   after 5000 -> exit("missing nodedown")
 2670:                   end,
 2671:                   Parent ! {DData,Done}
 2672:           end),
 2673:     receive
 2674:         {WhatSent,Done} ->
 2675:             io:format("Offender sent ~p~n",[WhatSent]),
 2676:             ok
 2677:     after 5000 ->
 2678:               exit(unable_to_send)
 2679:     end.
 2680: 
 2681: 
 2682: %% send_bad_msgs():
 2683: %% Send a valid distribution header and control message
 2684: %% but an invalid message. This invalid message will be
 2685: %% enqueued in the receivers message queue.
 2686: send_bad_msg(BadNode, To) ->
 2687:     send_bad_msgs(BadNode, To, 1).
 2688: 
 2689: send_bad_msgs(BadNode, To, Repeat) ->
 2690:     send_bad_msgs(BadNode, To, Repeat, dmsg_bad_atom_cache_ref()).
 2691: 
 2692: send_bad_msgs(BadNode, To, Repeat, BadTerm) when is_atom(BadNode),
 2693:                                                  is_pid(To),
 2694:                                                  is_integer(Repeat) ->
 2695:     Parent = self(),
 2696:     Done = make_ref(),
 2697:     spawn_link(BadNode,
 2698:                fun () ->
 2699:                        Node = node(To),
 2700:                        pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
 2701:                        DCtrl = dctrl(Node),
 2702:                        DData = [dmsg_hdr(),
 2703:                                 dmsg_ext({?DOP_SEND, ?COOKIE, To}),
 2704:                                 BadTerm],
 2705: 		       repeat(fun () -> dctrl_send(DCtrl, DData) end, Repeat),
 2706:                        Parent ! Done
 2707:                end),
 2708:     receive Done -> ok end.
 2709: 
 2710: %% send_bad_ctl():
 2711: %% Send a valid distribution header but an invalid control message.
 2712: send_bad_ctl(BadNode, ToNode) when is_atom(BadNode), is_atom(ToNode) ->
 2713:     Parent = self(),
 2714:     Done = make_ref(),
 2715:     spawn_link(BadNode,
 2716:                fun () ->
 2717:                        pong = net_adm:ping(ToNode),
 2718:                        %% We create a valid ctl msg and replace an
 2719:                        %% atom with an invalid atom cache reference
 2720:                        <<131,Replace/binary>> = term_to_binary(replace),
 2721:                        Ctl = dmsg_ext({?DOP_REG_SEND,
 2722:                                        self(),
 2723:                                        ?COOKIE,
 2724:                                        replace}),
 2725:                        CtlBeginSize = size(Ctl) - size(Replace),
 2726:                        <<CtlBegin:CtlBeginSize/binary, Replace/binary>> = Ctl,
 2727:                        DCtrl = dctrl(ToNode),
 2728:                        Data = [dmsg_fake_hdr2(),
 2729:                                CtlBegin,
 2730:                                dmsg_bad_atom_cache_ref(),
 2731:                                dmsg_ext({a, message})],
 2732:                        dctrl_send(DCtrl, Data),
 2733:                        Parent ! Done
 2734:                end),
 2735:     receive Done -> ok end.
 2736: 
 2737: %% send_bad_dhr():
 2738: %% Send an invalid distribution header
 2739: send_bad_dhdr(BadNode, ToNode) when is_atom(BadNode), is_atom(ToNode) ->
 2740:     Parent = self(),
 2741:     Done = make_ref(),
 2742:     spawn_link(BadNode,
 2743:                fun () ->
 2744:                        pong = net_adm:ping(ToNode),
 2745:                        dctrl_send(dctrl(ToNode), dmsg_bad_hdr()),
 2746:                        Parent ! Done
 2747:                end),
 2748:     receive Done -> ok end.
 2749: 
 2750: dctrl(Node) when is_atom(Node) ->
 2751:     get_internal_state({dist_ctrl, Node}).
 2752: 
 2753: get_internal_state(Op) ->
 2754:     try erts_debug:get_internal_state(Op) of
 2755:         R -> R
 2756:     catch
 2757:         error:undef ->
 2758:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 2759:             erts_debug:get_internal_state(Op)
 2760:     end.
 2761: 
 2762: set_internal_state(Op, Val) ->
 2763:     try erts_debug:set_internal_state(Op, Val) of
 2764:         R -> R
 2765:     catch
 2766:         error:undef ->
 2767:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 2768:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(Op, Val)
 2769:     end.
 2770: 
 2771: 
 2772: dmsg_hdr() ->
 2773:     [131, % Version Magic
 2774:      $D,  % Dist header
 2775:      0].  % No atom cache references
 2776: 
 2777: dmsg_bad_hdr() ->
 2778:     [131, % Version Magic
 2779:      $D,  % Dist header
 2780:      255].  % 255 atom references
 2781: 
 2782: 
 2783: %% dmsg_fake_hdr1() ->
 2784: %%     A = <<"fake header atom 1">>,
 2785: %%     [131, % Version Magic
 2786: %%      $D, 1, 16#8, 0, size(A), A]. % Fake header
 2787: 
 2788: dmsg_fake_hdr2() ->
 2789:     A1 = <<"fake header atom 1">>,
 2790:     A2 = <<"atom 2">>,
 2791:     A3 = <<"atom 3">>,
 2792:     [131, % Version Magic
 2793:      $D,
 2794:      3,
 2795:      16#88, 16#08, % Flags
 2796:      0, size(A1), A1,
 2797:      1, size(A2), A2,
 2798:      2, size(A3), A3].
 2799: 
 2800: dmsg_ext(Term) ->
 2801:     <<131, Res/binary>> = term_to_binary(Term),
 2802:     Res.
 2803: 
 2804: dmsg_bad_atom_cache_ref() ->
 2805:     [$R, 137].
 2806: 
 2807: dmsg_bad_tag() ->  %% Will fail early at heap size calculation
 2808:     [$?, 66].
 2809: 
 2810: %% Test that processes exiting while sending a fragmented message works
 2811: %% as it should. We test that this works while the process doing the send
 2812: %% is suspended/resumed in order to trigger bugs in suspend/resume handling
 2813: %% while exiting.
 2814: %% We also make sure that the binary memory of the receiving node does not grow
 2815: %% without shrinking back as there used to be a memory leak on the receiving side.
 2816: exit_dist_fragments(_Config) ->
 2817:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 2818:     try
 2819:         ct:log("Allocations before:~n~p",[erpc:call(Node,instrument,allocations, [])]),
 2820:         {BinInfo, BinInfoMref} =
 2821:             spawn_monitor(Node,
 2822:                           fun() ->
 2823:                                   (fun F(Acc) ->
 2824:                                            H = try erlang:memory(binary)
 2825:                                                catch _:_ -> 0 end,
 2826:                                            receive
 2827:                                                {get, Pid} ->
 2828:                                                    After = try erlang:memory(binary)
 2829:                                                            catch _:_ -> 0 end,
 2830:                                                    Pid ! lists:reverse([After,H|Acc])
 2831:                                            after 100 ->
 2832:                                                    F([H|Acc])
 2833:                                            end
 2834:                                    end)([])
 2835:                           end),
 2836:         {Tracer, Mref} = spawn_monitor(fun gather_exited/0),
 2837:         link(Tracer), %% Make sure Tracer dies if we die
 2838:         erlang:trace(self(), true, [{tracer, Tracer}, set_on_spawn, procs, exiting]),
 2839:         exit_suspend(Node),
 2840:         receive
 2841:             {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} ->
 2842:                 BinInfo ! {get, self()},
 2843:                 receive
 2844:                     {'DOWN',BinInfoMref,_,_,Reason} ->
 2845:                         ct:fail(Reason);
 2846:                     Info ->
 2847:                         Before = hd(Info),
 2848:                         Max = lists:max(Info),
 2849:                         After = lists:last(Info),
 2850:                         ct:log("Binary memory before: ~p~n"
 2851:                                "Binary memory max: ~p~n"
 2852:                                "Binary memory after: ~p",
 2853:                                [Before, Max, After]),
 2854:                         ct:log("Allocations after:~n~p",
 2855:                                [erpc:call(Node,instrument,allocations, [])]),
 2856:                         %% We check that the binary data used after is not too large
 2857:                         if
 2858:                             (After - Before) / (Max - Before) > 0.05 ->
 2859:                                 ct:log("Memory ratio was ~p",[(After - Before) / (Max - Before)]),
 2860:                                 ct:fail("Potential binary memory leak!");
 2861:                             true -> ok
 2862:                         end
 2863:                 end
 2864:         end
 2865:     after
 2866:         peer:stop(Peer)
 2867:     end.
 2868: 
 2869: %% Make sure that each spawned process also has exited
 2870: gather_exited() ->
 2871:     process_flag(message_queue_data, off_heap),
 2872:     gather_exited(#{}).
 2873: gather_exited(Pids) ->
 2874:     receive
 2875:         {trace,Pid,spawned,_,_} ->
 2876:             gather_exited(maps:update_with(spawned, fun(V) -> V + 1 end, 0, Pids#{ Pid => true }));
 2877:         {trace,Pid,out_exited,_} ->
 2878:             {true, NewPids} = maps:take(Pid, Pids),
 2879:             gather_exited(maps:update_with(out_exited, fun(V) -> V + 1 end, 0, NewPids));
 2880:         Trace ->
 2881:             gather_exited(maps:update_with(element(3, Trace), fun(V) -> V + 1 end, 0, Pids))
 2882:     after 1000 ->
 2883:             MissingPids = maps:size(maps:filter(fun(Key,_) -> not erlang:is_atom(Key) end, Pids)),
 2884:             if MissingPids =:= 0 -> ok;
 2885:                true -> exit({[{Pid,erlang:process_info(Pid)} || Pid <- MissingPids],
 2886:                              maps:filter(fun(Key,_) -> erlang:is_atom(Key) end, Pids)})
 2887:             end
 2888:     end.
 2889: 
 2890: exit_suspend(RemoteNode) ->
 2891:     exit_suspend(RemoteNode, 100).
 2892: exit_suspend(RemoteNode, N) ->
 2893:     Payload = case erlang:system_info(wordsize) of
 2894:                   8 ->
 2895:                       [<<0:100000/unit:8>> || _ <- lists:seq(1, 10)];
 2896:                   4 ->
 2897:                       [<<0:100000/unit:8>> || _ <- lists:seq(1, 2)]
 2898:               end,
 2899:     exit_suspend(RemoteNode, N, Payload).
 2900: exit_suspend(RemoteNode, N, Payload) ->
 2901:     Echo = fun F() ->
 2902:                    receive
 2903:                        {From, Msg} ->
 2904:                            From ! erlang:iolist_size(Msg),
 2905:                            F()
 2906:                    end
 2907:            end,
 2908:     Pinger =
 2909:         fun() ->
 2910:                 false = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2911:                 RemotePid = spawn_link(RemoteNode, Echo),
 2912:                 Iterations = case erlang:system_info(emu_type) of
 2913:                                  opt ->
 2914:                                      100;
 2915:                                  _ ->
 2916:                                      10
 2917:                              end,
 2918:                 exit_suspend_loop(RemotePid, 2, Payload, Iterations)
 2919:         end,
 2920:     Pids = [spawn_link(Pinger) || _ <- lists:seq(1, N)],
 2921:     MRefs = [monitor(process, Pid) || Pid <- Pids],
 2922:     [receive {'DOWN',MRef,_,_,_} -> ok end || MRef <- MRefs],
 2923:     Pids.
 2924: 
 2925: exit_suspend_loop(RemotePid, _Suspenders, _Payload, 0) ->
 2926:     exit(RemotePid, die),
 2927:     receive
 2928:         {'EXIT', RemotePid, _} ->
 2929:             ok
 2930:     end;
 2931: exit_suspend_loop(RemotePid, Suspenders, Payload, N) ->
 2932:     LocalPid = spawn_link(
 2933:                  fun() ->
 2934:                          Parent = self(),
 2935:                          [spawn_link(
 2936:                             fun F() ->
 2937:                                     try
 2938:                                         begin
 2939:                                             erlang:suspend_process(Parent),
 2940:                                             erlang:yield(),
 2941:                                             erlang:suspend_process(Parent),
 2942:                                             erlang:yield(),
 2943:                                             erlang:resume_process(Parent),
 2944:                                             erlang:yield(),
 2945:                                             erlang:suspend_process(Parent),
 2946:                                             erlang:yield(),
 2947:                                             erlang:resume_process(Parent),
 2948:                                             erlang:yield(),
 2949:                                             erlang:resume_process(Parent),
 2950:                                             erlang:yield()
 2951:                                         end of
 2952:                                         _ ->
 2953:                                             F()
 2954:                                     catch _:_ ->
 2955:                                             ok
 2956:                                     end
 2957:                             end) || _ <- lists:seq(1, Suspenders)],
 2958:                          (fun F() ->
 2959:                                   RemotePid ! {self(), Payload},
 2960:                                   receive _IOListSize -> ok end,
 2961:                                   F()
 2962:                           end)()
 2963:                  end),
 2964:     exit_suspend_loop(LocalPid, RemotePid, Suspenders, Payload, N - 1).
 2965: exit_suspend_loop(LocalPid, RemotePid, Suspenders, Payload, N) ->
 2966:     receive
 2967:         {'EXIT', LocalPid, _} ->
 2968:             exit_suspend_loop(RemotePid, Suspenders, Payload, N);
 2969:         {'EXIT', _, Reason} ->
 2970:             exit(Reason)
 2971:     after 100 ->
 2972:             exit(LocalPid, die),
 2973:             exit_suspend_loop(LocalPid, RemotePid, Suspenders, Payload, N)
 2974:     end.
 2975: 
 2976: start_epmd_false(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2977:     %% Start a node with the option -start_epmd false.
 2978:     {ok, Peer, OtherNode} = ?CT_PEER(["-start_epmd", "false"]),
 2979:     %% We should be able to ping it, as epmd was started by us:
 2980:     pong = net_adm:ping(OtherNode),
 2981:     peer_stop(Peer,OtherNode),
 2982: 
 2983:     ok.
 2984: 
 2985: no_epmd(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2986:     %% Trying to start a node with -no_epmd but without passing the
 2987:     %% --proto_dist option should fail.
 2988:     try
 2989:         ?CT_PEER(#{connection => standard_io, args => ["-no_epmd"]}),
 2990:         ct:fail(unexpected_no_epmd_start)
 2991:     catch
 2992:         exit:{boot_failed, {exit_status, 1}} ->
 2993:             ok
 2994:     end.
 2995: 
 2996: epmd_module(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2997:     %% We need a relay node to test this, since the test node uses the
 2998:     %% standard epmd module.
 2999:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(
 3000:                             #{connection => 0,
 3001:                               name => "epmd_module_node1",
 3002:                               host => "dummy",
 3003:                               args => ["-setcookie", "NONE", "-epmd_module", ?MODULE_STRING]}),
 3004:     %% Ask what port it's listening on - it won't have registered with epmd.
 3005:     {ok, Port1} = peer:call(Peer1, application, get_env, [kernel, dist_listen_port]),
 3006: 
 3007:     %% Start a second node, passing the port number as a secret argument.
 3008:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(
 3009:                             #{connection => 0,
 3010:                               name => "epmd_module_node2",
 3011:                               host => "dummy",
 3012:                               args => ["-setcookie", "NONE", "-epmd_module", ?MODULE_STRING,
 3013:                                        "-other_node_port", integer_to_list(Port1)]}),
 3014: 
 3015:     %% Node 1 can't ping node 2
 3016:     pang = peer:call(Peer1, net_adm, ping, [Node2]),
 3017:     [] = peer:call(Peer1, erlang, nodes, []),
 3018:     [] = peer:call(Peer2, erlang, nodes, []),
 3019:     %% But node 2 can ping node 1
 3020:     pong = peer:call(Peer2, net_adm, ping, [Node1]),
 3021:     [Node2] = peer:call(Peer1, erlang, nodes, []),
 3022:     [Node1] = peer:call(Peer2, erlang, nodes, []),
 3023: 
 3024:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 3025:     peer:stop(Peer1).
 3026: 
 3027: %% epmd_module functions:
 3028: 
 3029: start_link() ->
 3030:     ignore.
 3031: 
 3032: register_node(Name, Port) ->
 3033:     register_node(Name, Port, inet_tcp).
 3034: register_node(_Name, Port, _Driver) ->
 3035:     %% Save the port number we're listening on.
 3036:     application:set_env(kernel, dist_listen_port, Port),
 3037:     Creation = rand:uniform(3),
 3038:     {ok, Creation}.
 3039: 
 3040: port_please(_Name, _Ip) ->
 3041:     case init:get_argument(other_node_port) of
 3042: 	error ->
 3043: 	    %% None specified.  Default to 42.
 3044: 	    Port = 42,
 3045: 	    Version = 5,
 3046: 	    {port, Port, Version};
 3047: 	{ok, [[PortS]]} ->
 3048: 	    %% Port number given on command line.
 3049: 	    Port = list_to_integer(PortS),
 3050: 	    Version = 5,
 3051: 	    {port, Port, Version}
 3052:     end.
 3053: 
 3054: address_please(_Name, "dummy", inet) ->
 3055:     %% Use localhost.
 3056:     {ok, {127,0,0,1}};
 3057: address_please(_Name, "dummy", inet6) ->
 3058:     {ok, {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}}.
 3059: 
 3060: hopefull_data_encoding(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3061:     MkHopefullData = fun(Ref,Pid) -> mk_hopefull_data(Ref,Pid) end,
 3062:     test_hopefull_data_encoding(MkHopefullData),
 3063: 
 3064:     %% Test funs with hopefully encoded term in environment
 3065:     MkBitstringInFunEnv = fun(_,_) -> [mk_fun_with_env(<<5:7>>)] end,
 3066:     test_hopefull_data_encoding(MkBitstringInFunEnv),
 3067:     MkExpFunInFunEnv = fun(_,_) -> [mk_fun_with_env(fun a:a/0)] end,
 3068:     test_hopefull_data_encoding(MkExpFunInFunEnv),
 3069:     ok.
 3070: 
 3071: mk_fun_with_env(Term) ->
 3072:     fun() -> Term end.
 3073: 
 3074: test_hopefull_data_encoding(MkDataFun) ->
 3075:     {ok, PeerProxy, ProxyNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3076:     {ok, PeerBouncer, BouncerNode} = ?CT_PEER(["-hidden"]),
 3077:     Tester = self(),
 3078:     R1 = make_ref(),
 3079:     R2 = make_ref(),
 3080:     R3 = make_ref(),
 3081:     Bouncer = spawn_link(BouncerNode, fun () -> bounce_loop() end),
 3082:     Proxy = spawn_link(ProxyNode,
 3083:                        fun () ->
 3084:                                register(bouncer, self()),
 3085:                                %% We create the data on the proxy node in order
 3086:                                %% to create the correct sub binaries
 3087:                                HData = MkDataFun(R1, Tester),
 3088:                                %% Verify same result between this node and tester
 3089:                                Tester ! [R1, HData],
 3090:                                %% Test when connection has not been setup yet
 3091:                                Bouncer ! {Tester, [R2, HData]},
 3092:                                Sync = make_ref(),
 3093:                                Bouncer ! {self(), Sync},
 3094:                                receive Sync -> ok end,
 3095:                                %% Test when connection is already up
 3096:                                Bouncer ! {Tester, [R3, HData]},
 3097:                                receive after infinity -> ok end
 3098:                        end),
 3099:     HData =
 3100:         receive
 3101:             [R1, HData1] ->
 3102:                 HData1
 3103:         end,
 3104:     receive
 3105:         [R2, HData2] ->
 3106:             HData = HData2
 3107:     end,
 3108:     receive
 3109:         [R3, HData3] ->
 3110:             HData = HData3
 3111:     end,
 3112:     unlink(Proxy),
 3113:     exit(Proxy, bye),
 3114:     unlink(Bouncer),
 3115:     exit(Bouncer, bye),
 3116:     peer_stop(PeerProxy, ProxyNode),
 3117:     peer_stop(PeerBouncer, BouncerNode),
 3118:     ok.
 3119: 
 3120: bounce_loop() ->
 3121:     receive
 3122:         {SendTo, Data} ->
 3123:             SendTo ! Data
 3124:     end,
 3125:     bounce_loop().
 3126: 
 3127: mk_hopefull_data(RemoteRef, RemotePid) ->
 3128:     HugeBs = list_to_bitstring([lists:duplicate(12*1024*1024, 85), <<6:6>>]),
 3129:     <<_:1/bitstring,HugeBs2/bitstring>> = HugeBs,
 3130:     mk_hopefull_data(list_to_binary(lists:seq(1,255))) ++
 3131:         [1234567890, HugeBs, fun gurka:banan/3, fun erlang:node/1,
 3132:          RemotePid, self(), fun erlang:self/0] ++
 3133:         mk_hopefull_data(list_to_binary(lists:seq(1,32))) ++
 3134:         [an_atom,
 3135:          fun lists:reverse/1, RemoteRef, make_ref(), HugeBs2,
 3136:          fun blipp:blapp/7].
 3137: 
 3138: mk_hopefull_data(BS) ->
 3139:     BSsz = bit_size(BS),
 3140:     lists:concat(
 3141:       [lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3142:                          <<NewBs:Offset/bitstring, _/bitstring>> = BS,
 3143:                          NewBs
 3144:                  end, lists:seq(1, 16)),
 3145:        lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3146:                          <<_:Offset/bitstring, NewBs/bitstring>> = BS,
 3147:                          NewBs
 3148:                  end, lists:seq(1, 16)),
 3149:        lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3150:                          <<NewBs:Offset/bitstring, _/bitstring>> = BS,
 3151:                          NewBs
 3152:                  end, lists:seq(BSsz-16, BSsz-1)),
 3153:        lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3154:                          PreOffset = Offset rem 16,
 3155:                          <<_:PreOffset/bitstring, NewBs:Offset/bitstring, _/bitstring>> = BS,
 3156:                          NewBs
 3157:                  end, lists:seq(BSsz-32, BSsz-17)),
 3158:        lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3159:                          <<NewBs:Offset/bitstring, _/bitstring>> = BS,
 3160:                          [NewBs]
 3161:                  end, lists:seq(1, 16)),
 3162:        lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3163:                          <<_:Offset/bitstring, NewBs/bitstring>> = BS,
 3164:                          [NewBs]
 3165:                  end, lists:seq(1, 16)),
 3166:        lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3167:                          <<NewBs:Offset/bitstring, _/bitstring>> = BS,
 3168:                          [NewBs]
 3169:                  end, lists:seq(BSsz-16, BSsz-1)),
 3170:        lists:map(fun (Offset) ->
 3171:                          PreOffset = Offset rem 16,
 3172:                          <<_:PreOffset/bitstring, NewBs:Offset/bitstring, _/bitstring>> = BS,
 3173:                          [NewBs]
 3174:                  end, lists:seq(BSsz-32, BSsz-17))]).
 3175: 
 3176: %% ERL-1254
 3177: hopefull_export_fun_bug(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3178:     Msg = [1, fun blipp:blapp/7,
 3179:            2, fun blipp:blapp/7],
 3180:     {dummy, dummy@dummy} ! Msg.  % Would crash on debug VM
 3181: 
 3182: huge_iovec(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3183:     %% Make sure that we can pass a term that will produce
 3184:     %% an io-vector larger than IOV_MAX over the distribution...
 3185:     %% IOV_MAX is typically 1024. Currently we produce an
 3186:     %% element in the io-vector for all off heap binaries...
 3187:     NoBinaries = 1 bsl 14,
 3188:     BinarySize = 65,
 3189:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3190:     P = spawn_link(Node,
 3191:                    fun () ->
 3192:                            receive {From, Data} ->
 3193:                                    From ! {self(), Data}
 3194:                            end
 3195:                    end),
 3196:     RBL = mk_rand_bin_list(BinarySize, NoBinaries),
 3197:     %% Check that it actually will produce a huge iovec...
 3198:     %% If we set a limit on the size of the binaries
 3199:     %% that will produce an element in the io-vector
 3200:     %% we need to adjust this testcase...
 3201:     true = length(term_to_iovec(RBL)) >= NoBinaries,
 3202:     P ! {self(), RBL},
 3203:     receive
 3204:         {P, EchoedRBL} ->
 3205:             peer_stop(Peer, Node),
 3206:             RBL = EchoedRBL
 3207:     end,
 3208:     ok.
 3209: 
 3210: mk_rand_bin_list(Bytes, Binaries) ->
 3211:     mk_rand_bin_list(Bytes, Binaries, []).
 3212: 
 3213: mk_rand_bin_list(_Bytes, 0, Acc) ->
 3214:     Acc;
 3215: mk_rand_bin_list(Bytes, Binaries, Acc) ->
 3216:     mk_rand_bin_list(Bytes, Binaries-1, [rand:bytes(Bytes) | Acc]).
 3217: 
 3218: %% Try provoke DistEntry refc bugs (OTP-17513).
 3219: dist_entry_refc_race(_Config) ->
 3220:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["+zdntgc", "1"]),
 3221:     Pid = spawn_link(Node, ?MODULE, derr_run, [self()]),
 3222:     {Pid, done} = receive M -> M end,
 3223:     peer_stop(Peer, Node),
 3224:     ok.
 3225: 
 3226: derr_run(Papa) ->
 3227:     inet_db:set_lookup([file]), % make connection attempt fail fast
 3228:     NScheds = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 3229:     SeqList = lists:seq(1, 25 * NScheds),
 3230:     Nodes = [list_to_atom("none@host" ++ integer_to_list(Seq))
 3231:              || Seq <- SeqList],
 3232:     Self = self(),
 3233:     Pids = [spawn_link(fun () -> derr_sender(Self, Nodes) end)
 3234:             || _ <- SeqList],
 3235:     derr_count(1, 8000),
 3236:     [begin unlink(P), exit(P,kill) end || P <- Pids],
 3237:     Papa ! {self(), done},
 3238:     ok.
 3239: 
 3240: derr_count(Max, Max) ->
 3241:     done;
 3242: derr_count(N, Max) ->
 3243:     receive
 3244:         count -> ok
 3245:     end,
 3246:     case N rem 1000 of
 3247:         0 ->
 3248:             io:format("Total attempts: ~bk~n", [N div 1000]);
 3249:         _ -> ok
 3250:     end,
 3251:     derr_count(N+1, Max).
 3252: 
 3253: 
 3254: derr_sender(Main, Nodes) ->
 3255:     [{none, Node} ! msg || Node <- Nodes],
 3256:     Main ! count,
 3257:     derr_sender(Main, Nodes).
 3258: 
 3259: is_alive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3260:     %% Test that distribution is up when erlang:is_alive() return true...
 3261:     Args = ["-setcookie", atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie()),
 3262:             "-pa", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE))],
 3263:     {ok, Peer, _} = peer:start_link(#{connection => 0, args => Args}),
 3264:     NodeName = peer:random_name(),
 3265:     LongNames = net_kernel:longnames(),
 3266:     StartOpts = #{name_domain => if LongNames -> longnames;
 3267:                                     true -> shortnames
 3268:                                  end},
 3269:     ThisNode = node(),
 3270:     TestFun = fun () -> is_alive_test(list_to_atom(NodeName), StartOpts, ThisNode) end,
 3271:     ok = peer:call(Peer, erlang, apply, [TestFun, []]),
 3272:     Node = list_to_atom(NodeName++"@"++hostname()),
 3273:     true = lists:member(Node, nodes()),
 3274:     peer:stop(Peer),
 3275:     ok.
 3276: 
 3277: is_alive_test(NodeName, StartOpts, TestNode) ->
 3278:     try
 3279:         monitor_node(TestNode, true),
 3280:         error(unexpected_success)
 3281:     catch
 3282:         error:notalive ->
 3283:             ok
 3284:     end,
 3285:     Me = self(),
 3286:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 3287:                                        Me ! {self(), go},
 3288:                                        is_alive_tester(TestNode),
 3289:                                        Me ! {self(), ok}
 3290:                                end),
 3291:     receive {Pid, go} -> ok end,
 3292:     receive after 500 -> ok end,
 3293:     _ = net_kernel:start(NodeName, StartOpts),
 3294:     receive
 3295:         {Pid, ok} -> erlang:demonitor(Mon, [flush]), ok;
 3296:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} -> error(Reason)
 3297:     end.
 3298: 
 3299: is_alive_tester(Node) ->
 3300:     case erlang:is_alive() of
 3301:         false ->
 3302:             is_alive_tester(Node);
 3303:         true ->
 3304:             monitor_node(Node, true),
 3305:             wait_until(fun () -> lists:member(Node, nodes()) end),
 3306:             ok
 3307:     end.
 3308:

 3396:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 3397:     {ok, Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(["+pad", "true", "+pad", "false"]),
 3398:     async_dist_flag_test(Node3, false),
 3399:     peer:stop(Peer3),
 3400: 
 3401:     {ok, Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(["+pad", "true"]),
 3402:     async_dist_flag_test(Node4, true),
 3403:     peer:stop(Peer4),
 3404:     {ok, Peer5, Node5} = ?CT_PEER(["+pad", "false", "+pad", "true"]),

 3410: async_dist_flag_test(Node, Default) when is_atom(Node), is_boolean(Default) ->
 3411:     Tester = self(),
 3412:     NotDefault = not Default,
 3413: 
 3414:     Default = erpc:call(Node, erlang, system_info, [async_dist]),
 3415: 
 3416:     {P1, M1} = spawn_opt(Node, fun () ->
 3417:                                        receive after infinity -> ok end
 3418:                                end, [link, monitor]),
 3419:     {P2, M2} = spawn_opt(Node, fun () ->
 3420:                                        receive after infinity -> ok end
 3421:                                end, [link, monitor, {async_dist, false}]),
 3422:     {P3, M3} = spawn_opt(Node, fun () ->
 3423:                                        receive after infinity -> ok end
 3424:                                end, [link, monitor, {async_dist, true}]),
 3425:     {async_dist, Default} = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P1, async_dist]),
 3426:     {async_dist, false} = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P2, async_dist]),
 3427:     {async_dist, true} = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P3, async_dist]),
 3428: 
 3429:     R4 = make_ref(),
 3430:     {P4, M4} = spawn_opt(Node, fun () ->
 3431:                                        Default = process_flag(async_dist, NotDefault),
 3432:                                        Tester ! R4,
 3433:                                        receive after infinity -> ok end
 3434:                                end, [link, monitor]),
 3435: 
 3436:     R5 = make_ref(),
 3437:     {P5, M5} = spawn_opt(Node, fun () ->
 3438:                                        false = process_flag(async_dist, true),
 3439:                                        Tester ! R5,
 3440:                                        receive after infinity -> ok end
 3441:                                end, [link, monitor, {async_dist, false}]),
 3442:     R6 = make_ref(),
 3443:     {P6, M6} = spawn_opt(Node, fun () ->
 3444:                                        true = process_flag(async_dist, false),
 3445:                                        Tester ! R6,
 3446:                                        receive after infinity -> ok end
 3447:                                end, [link, monitor, {async_dist, true}]),
 3448:     receive R4 -> ok end,
 3449:     {async_dist, NotDefault} = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P4, async_dist]),
 3450:     receive R5 -> ok end,
 3451:     {async_dist, true} = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P5, async_dist]),
 3452:     receive R6 -> ok end,
 3453:     {async_dist, false} = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P6, async_dist]),
 3454: 
 3455: 
 3456:     R7 = make_ref(),
 3457:     {P7, M7} = spawn_opt(Node, fun () ->
 3458:                                        Default = process_flag(async_dist, NotDefault),
 3459:                                        NotDefault = process_flag(async_dist, NotDefault),
 3460:                                        NotDefault = process_flag(async_dist, NotDefault),
 3461:                                        NotDefault = process_flag(async_dist, Default),
 3462:                                        Default = process_flag(async_dist, Default),
 3463:                                        Default = process_flag(async_dist, Default),
 3464:                                        Tester ! R7,
 3465:                                        receive after infinity -> ok end
 3466:                                end, [link, monitor]),
 3467:     receive R7 -> ok end,
 3468: 
 3469:     unlink(P1),
 3470:     exit(P1, bang),
 3471:     unlink(P2),
 3472:     exit(P2, bang),
 3473:     unlink(P3),
 3474:     exit(P3, bang),
 3475:     unlink(P4),
 3476:     exit(P4, bang),
 3477:     unlink(P5),
 3478:     exit(P5, bang),
 3479:     unlink(P6),
 3480:     exit(P6, bang),
 3481:     unlink(P7),
 3482:     exit(P7, bang),
 3483: 
 3484:     receive {'DOWN', M1, process, P1, bang} -> ok end,
 3485:     receive {'DOWN', M2, process, P2, bang} -> ok end,
 3486:     receive {'DOWN', M3, process, P3, bang} -> ok end,
 3487:     receive {'DOWN', M4, process, P4, bang} -> ok end,
 3488:     receive {'DOWN', M5, process, P5, bang} -> ok end,
 3489:     receive {'DOWN', M6, process, P6, bang} -> ok end,
 3490:     receive {'DOWN', M7, process, P7, bang} -> ok end,
 3491: 
 3492:     ok.
