 3500: async_dist_proc_dctrlr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3501:     {ok, SendPeer, SendNode} = ?CT_PEER(["-proto_dist", "gen_tcp"]),
 3502:     {ok, RecvPeer, RecvNode} = ?CT_PEER(["-proto_dist", "gen_tcp"]),
 3503:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(SendNode,
 3504:                                fun () ->
 3505:                                        ok = async_dist_test(RecvNode),
 3506:                                        exit(test_success)
 3507:                                end),
 3508:     receive
 3509:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 3510:             test_success = Reason
 3511:     end,
 3512:     peer:stop(SendPeer),
 3513:     peer:stop(RecvPeer),
 3514:     ok.
 3515: 
 3516: async_dist_test(Node) ->
 3517:     Scale = case round(test_server:timetrap_scale_factor()/3) of
 3518:                 S when S < 1 -> 1;
 3519:                 S -> S
 3520:             end,
 3521:     _ = process_flag(async_dist, false),
 3522:     Tester = self(),
 3523:     AliveReceiver1 = spawn_link(Node, fun () ->
 3524:                                               register(alive_receiver_1, self()),
 3525:                                               Tester ! {registered, self()},
 3526:                                               receive after infinity -> ok end
 3527:                                       end),
 3528:     receive {registered, AliveReceiver1} -> ok end,
 3529:     AliveReceiver2 = spawn(Node, fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end),
 3530:     {AliveReceiver3, AR3Mon} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 3531:                                              fun () ->
 3532:                                                      receive after infinity -> ok end
 3533:                                              end),
 3534:     {DeadReceiver, DRMon} = spawn_monitor(Node, fun () -> ok end),
 3535:     receive
 3536:         {'DOWN', DRMon, process, DeadReceiver, DRReason} ->
 3537:             normal = DRReason
 3538:     end,
 3539:     Data = lists:duplicate($x, 256),
 3540:     GoNuts = fun GN () ->
 3541:                      DeadReceiver ! hello,
 3542:                      GN()
 3543:              end,
 3544:     erpc:call(Node, erts_debug, set_internal_state, [available_internal_state, true]),
 3545:     erpc:cast(Node, erts_debug, set_internal_state, [block, 4000*Scale]),
 3546:     DistBufFiller = spawn_link(fun () ->
 3547:                                        process_flag(async_dist, false),
 3548:                                        receive go_nuts -> ok end,
 3549:                                        GoNuts()
 3550:                                end),
 3551:     BDMon = spawn_link(fun SysMon () ->
 3552:                                receive
 3553:                                    {monitor, Pid, busy_dist_port, _} ->
 3554:                                        Tester ! {busy_dist_port, Pid}
 3555:                                end,
 3556:                                SysMon()
 3557:                        end),
 3558:     _ = erlang:system_monitor(BDMon, [busy_dist_port]),
 3559:     DistBufFiller ! go_nuts,
 3560: 
 3561:     %% Busy dist entry may release after it has triggered even
 3562:     %% though noone is consuming anything at the receiving end.
 3563:     %% Continue banging until we stop getting new busy_dist_port...
 3564:     WaitFilled = fun WF (Tmo) ->
 3565:                          receive
 3566:                              {busy_dist_port, DistBufFiller} ->
 3567:                                  WF(1000*Scale)
 3568:                          after
 3569:                              Tmo ->
 3570:                                  ok
 3571:                          end
 3572:                  end,
 3573:     WaitFilled(infinity),
 3574: 
 3575:     BusyDistChecker = spawn_link(fun () ->
 3576:                                          process_flag(async_dist, false),
 3577:                                          DeadReceiver ! hello,
 3578:                                          exit(unexpected_return_from_bang)
 3579:                                  end),
 3580:     receive {busy_dist_port, BusyDistChecker} -> ok end,
 3581:     {async_dist, false} = process_info(self(), async_dist),
 3582:     {async_dist, false} = process_info(BusyDistChecker, async_dist),
 3583:     false = process_flag(async_dist, true),
 3584:     {async_dist, true} = process_info(self(), async_dist),
 3585: 
 3586:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 3587:     M1 = erlang:monitor(process, AliveReceiver1),
 3588:     true = is_reference(M1),
 3589:     M2 = erlang:monitor(process, AliveReceiver2),
 3590:     true = is_reference(M2),
 3591:     {pid, Data} = AliveReceiver1 ! {pid, Data},
 3592:     {reg_name, Data} = {alive_receiver_1, Node} ! {reg_name, Data},
 3593:     true = erlang:demonitor(M1),
 3594:     true = link(AliveReceiver2),
 3595:     true = unlink(AliveReceiver1),
 3596:     RId = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> receive bye -> ok end end, [link, monitor]),
 3597:     true = is_reference(RId),
 3598:     erlang:group_leader(self(), AliveReceiver2),
 3599:     AR3XReason = make_ref(),
 3600:     true = exit(AliveReceiver3, AR3XReason),
 3601:     End = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 3602: 
 3603:     %% These signals should have been buffered immediately. Make sure
 3604:     %% it did not take a long time...
 3605:     true = 500*Scale >= End - Start,
 3606: 
 3607:     receive after 500*Scale -> ok end,
 3608: 
 3609:     unlink(BusyDistChecker),
 3610:     exit(BusyDistChecker, bang),
 3611:     false = is_process_alive(BusyDistChecker),
 3612: 
 3613:     unlink(DistBufFiller),
 3614:     exit(DistBufFiller, bang),
 3615:     false = is_process_alive(DistBufFiller),
 3616: 
 3617:     %% Verify that the signals eventually get trough when the other
 3618:     %% node continue to work...
 3619:     {links, []}
 3620:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [AliveReceiver1, links]),
 3621:     {links, [Tester]}
 3622:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [AliveReceiver2, links]),
 3623:     {monitored_by, []}
 3624:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [AliveReceiver1, monitored_by]),
 3625:     {monitored_by, [Tester]}
 3626:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [AliveReceiver2, monitored_by]),
 3627:     {messages, [{pid, Data}, {reg_name, Data}]}
 3628:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [AliveReceiver1, messages]),
 3629:     {group_leader, Tester}
 3630:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [AliveReceiver2, group_leader]),
 3631: 
 3632:     Spawned = receive
 3633:                   {spawn_reply, RId, SpawnRes, Pid} ->
 3634:                       ok = SpawnRes,
 3635:                       true = is_pid(Pid),
 3636:                       Pid
 3637:               end,
 3638:     {links, [Tester]}
 3639:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [Spawned, links]),
 3640:     {monitored_by, [Tester]}
 3641:         = erpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [Spawned, monitored_by]),
 3642: 
 3643:     receive
 3644:         {'DOWN', AR3Mon, process, AliveReceiver3, ActualAR3XReason} ->
 3645:             AR3XReason = ActualAR3XReason
 3646:     end,
 3647: 
 3648:     unlink(AliveReceiver2),
 3649:     unlink(Spawned),
 3650: 
 3651:     true = process_flag(async_dist, false),
 3652:     {async_dist, false} = process_info(self(), async_dist),
 3653: 
 3654:     ok.
 3655: 
 3656: creation_selection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3657:     register(creation_selection_test_supervisor, self()),
 3658:     Name = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME) ++ "-"
 3659:         ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time()),
 3660:     Host = hostname(),
 3661:     Cmd = lists:append(
 3662:             [ct:get_progname(),
 3663:              " -noshell",
 3664:              " -setcookie ", atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie()),
 3665:              " -pa ", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 3666:              " -s ", atom_to_list(?MODULE), " ",
 3667:              " creation_selection_test ", atom_to_list(node()), " ",
 3668:              atom_to_list(net_kernel:longnames()), " ", Name, " ", Host]),
 3669:     ct:pal("Node command: ~p~n", [Cmd]),
 3670:     Port = open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [exit_status]),
 3671:     Node = list_to_atom(lists:append([Name, "@", Host])),
 3672:     ok = receive_creation_selection_info(Port, Node).
 3673: 
 3674: receive_creation_selection_info(Port, Node) ->
 3675:     receive
 3676:         {creation_selection_test, Node, Creations, InvalidCreation,
 3677:          ClashResolvedCreation} = Msg ->
 3678:             ct:log("Test result: ~p~n", [Msg]),
 3679:             %% Verify that creation values are created as expected. The
 3680:             %% list of creations is in reverse start order...
 3681:             MaxC = (1 bsl 32) - 1,
 3682:             MinC = 4,
 3683:             StartOrderCreations = lists:reverse(Creations),
 3684:             InvalidCreation = lists:foldl(fun (C, C) when is_integer(C),
 3685:                                                           MinC =< C,
 3686:                                                           C =< MaxC ->
 3687:                                                   %% Return next expected
 3688:                                                   %% creation...
 3689:                                                   if C == MaxC -> MinC;
 3690:                                                      true -> C+1
 3691:                                                   end
 3692:                                           end,
 3693:                                           hd(StartOrderCreations),
 3694:                                           StartOrderCreations),
 3695:             false = lists:member(ClashResolvedCreation, [InvalidCreation
 3696:                                                         | Creations]),
 3697:             receive
 3698:                 {Port, {exit_status, 0}} ->
 3699:                     Port ! {self(), close},
 3700:                     ok;
 3701:                 {Port, {exit_status, EStat}} ->
 3702:                     ct:fail({"node exited abnormally: ", EStat})
 3703:             end;
 3704:         {Port, {exit_status, EStat}} ->
 3705:             ct:fail({"node prematurely exited: ", EStat});
 3706:         {Port, {data, Data}} ->
 3707:             ct:log("~ts", [Data]),
 3708:             receive_creation_selection_info(Port, Node)
 3709:     end,
 3710:     ok.
 3711: 
 3712: creation_selection_test([TestSupNode, LongNames, Name, Host]) ->
 3713:     try
 3714:         StartArgs = [Name,
 3715:                      case LongNames of
 3716:                          true -> longnames;
 3717:                          false -> shortnames
 3718:                      end],
 3719:         Node = list_to_atom(lists:append([atom_to_list(Name),
 3720:                                           "@", atom_to_list(Host)])),
 3721:         GoDistributed = fun (F) ->
 3722:                                 {ok, _} = net_kernel:start(StartArgs),
 3723:                                 Node = node(),
 3724:                                 Creation = erlang:system_info(creation),
 3725:                                 _ = F(Creation),
 3726:                                 net_kernel:stop(),
 3727:                                 Creation
 3728:                         end,
 3729:         %% We start multiple times to verify that the creation values
 3730:         %% we get from epmd are delivered in sequence. This is a
 3731:         %% must for the test case such as it is written now, but can be
 3732:         %% changed. If changed, this test case must be updated...
 3733:         {Creations,
 3734:          LastCreation} = lists:foldl(fun (_, {Cs, _LC}) ->
 3735:                                              CFun = fun (X) -> X end,
 3736:                                              C = GoDistributed(CFun),
 3737:                                              {[C|Cs], C}
 3738:                                      end, {[], 0}, lists:seq(1, 5)),
 3739:         %% We create a pid with the creation that epmd will offer us the next
 3740:         %% time we start the distribution and then start the distribution
 3741:         %% once more. The node should avoid this creation, since this would
 3742:         %% cause external identifiers in the system with same
 3743:         %% nodename/creation pair as used by the local node, which in turn
 3744:         %% would cause these identifers not to work as expected. That is, the
 3745:         %% node should silently reject this creation and chose another one when
 3746:         %% starting the distribution.
 3747:         InvalidCreation = LastCreation+1,
 3748:         Pid = erts_test_utils:mk_ext_pid({Node, InvalidCreation}, 4711, 0),
 3749:         true = erts_debug:size(Pid) > 0, %% External pid
 3750:         ResultFun = fun (ClashResolvedCreation) ->
 3751:                             pong = net_adm:ping(TestSupNode),
 3752:                             Msg = {creation_selection_test, node(), Creations,
 3753:                                    InvalidCreation, ClashResolvedCreation},
 3754:                             {creation_selection_test_supervisor, TestSupNode}
 3755:                                 ! Msg,
 3756:                             %% Wait a bit so the message have time to get
 3757:                             %% through before we take down the distribution...
 3758:                             receive after 500 -> ok end
 3759:                     end,
 3760:         _ = GoDistributed(ResultFun),
 3761:         %% Ensure Pid is not garbage collected before starting the
 3762:         %% distribution...
 3763:         _ = id(Pid),
 3764:         erlang:halt(0)
 3765:     catch
 3766:         Class:Reason:StackTrace ->
 3767:             erlang:display({Class, Reason, StackTrace}),
 3768:             erlang:halt(17)
 3769:     end.
 3770: 
 3771: %%% Utilities
 3772: 
 3773: id(X) ->
 3774:     X.
 3775: 
 3776: wait_until(Fun) ->
 3777:     wait_until(Fun, 24*60*60*1000).
 3778: 
 3779: wait_until(Fun, Timeout) when Timeout < 0 ->
 3780:     timeout;
 3781: wait_until(Fun, Timeout) ->
 3782:     case catch Fun() of
 3783:         true ->
 3784:             ok;
 3785:         _ ->
 3786:             receive after 50 -> ok end,
 3787:             wait_until(Fun, Timeout-50)
 3788:     end.
 3789: 
 3790: timestamp() ->
 3791:     erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond).
 3792: 
 3793: peer_stop(Peer, Node) ->
 3794:     verify_nc(Node),
 3795:     peer:stop(Peer).
 3796: 
 3797: verify_nc(Node) ->
 3798:     P = self(),
 3799:     Ref = make_ref(),
 3800:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 3801:                 fun() ->
 3802:                         R = erts_test_utils:check_node_dist(fun(E) -> E end),
 3803:                         P ! {Ref, R}
 3804:                 end),
 3805:     MonRef = monitor(process, Pid),
 3806:     receive
 3807:         {Ref, ok} ->
 3808:             demonitor(MonRef,[flush]),
 3809:             ok;
 3810:         {Ref, Error} ->
 3811:             ct:log("~s",[Error]),
 3812:             ct:fail(failed_nc_refc_check);
 3813:         {'DOWN', MonRef, _, _, _} = Down ->
 3814:             ct:log("~p",[Down]),
 3815:             ct:fail(crashed_nc_refc_check)
 3816:     end.
 3817: 
 3818: freeze_node(Node, MS) ->
 3819:     Own = 300,
 3820:     DoingIt = make_ref(),
 3821:     Freezer = self(),
 3822:     spawn_link(Node,
 3823:                fun () ->
 3824:                        dctrl_dop_send(Freezer, DoingIt),
 3825:                        receive after Own -> ok end,
 3826:                        set_internal_state(block, MS+Own)
 3827:                end),
 3828:     receive DoingIt -> ok end,
 3829:     receive after Own -> ok end.
 3830: 
 3831: start_node_monitors(Nodes) ->
 3832:     Master = self(),
 3833:     lists:foreach(fun (Node) ->
 3834:                           spawn(Node,
 3835:                                 fun () ->
 3836:                                         node_monitor(Master)
 3837:                                 end)
 3838:                   end,
 3839:                   Nodes),
 3840:     ok.
 3841: 
 3842: node_monitor(Master) ->
 3843:     Opts = [nodedown_reason,{node_type,all}],
 3844:     Nodes0 = nodes(connected),
 3845:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, Opts),
 3846:     Nodes1 = nodes(connected),
 3847:     case lists:sort(Nodes0) == lists:sort(Nodes1) of
 3848:         true ->
 3849:             lists:foreach(fun (Node) ->
 3850:                                   Master ! {nodeup, node(), Node}
 3851:                           end,
 3852:                           Nodes0),
 3853:             io:format("~p ~p: ~p~n", [node(), erlang:system_time(microsecond), Nodes0]),
 3854:             node_monitor_loop(Master);
 3855:         false ->
 3856:             net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, Opts),
 3857:             flush_node_changes(),
 3858:             node_monitor(Master)
 3859:     end.
 3860: 
 3861: flush_node_changes() ->
 3862:     receive
 3863:         {NodeChange, _Node, _InfoList} when NodeChange == nodeup;
 3864:                                             NodeChange == nodedown ->
 3865:             flush_node_changes()
 3866:     after 0 ->
 3867:               ok
 3868:     end.
 3869: 
 3870: node_monitor_loop(Master) ->
 3871:     receive
 3872:         {nodeup, Node, _InfoList} = Msg ->
 3873:             Master ! {nodeup, node(), Node},
 3874:             io:format("~p ~p: ~p~n", [node(), erlang:system_time(microsecond), Msg]),
 3875:             node_monitor_loop(Master);
 3876:         {nodedown, Node, InfoList} = Msg ->
 3877:             Reason = case lists:keysearch(nodedown_reason, 1, InfoList) of
 3878:                          {value, {nodedown_reason, R}} -> R;
 3879:                          _ -> undefined
 3880:                      end,
 3881:             Master ! {nodedown, node(), Node, Reason},
 3882:             io:format("~p ~p: ~p~n", [node(), erlang:system_time(microsecond), Msg]),
 3883:             node_monitor_loop(Master)
 3884:     end.
 3885: 
 3886: verify_up(A, B) ->
 3887:     receive {nodeup, A, B} -> ok end,
 3888:     receive {nodeup, B, A} -> ok end.
 3889: 
 3890: verify_still_up(A, B) ->
 3891:     true = lists:member(B, rpc:call(A, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 3892:     true = lists:member(A, rpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, [connected])),
 3893:     verify_no_down(A, B).
 3894: 
 3895: verify_no_down(A, B) ->
 3896:     receive
 3897:         {nodedown, A, B, _} = Msg0 ->
 3898:             ct:fail(Msg0)
 3899:     after 0 ->
 3900:               ok
 3901:     end,
 3902:     receive
 3903:         {nodedown, B, A, _} = Msg1 ->
 3904:             ct:fail(Msg1)
 3905:     after 0 ->
 3906:               ok
 3907:     end.
 3908: 
 3909: %% verify_down(A, B) ->
 3910: %%     receive {nodedown, A, B, _} -> ok end,
 3911: %%     receive {nodedown, B, A, _} -> ok end.
 3912: 
 3913: verify_down(A, ReasonA, B, ReasonB) ->
 3914:     receive
 3915:         {nodedown, A, B, _} = Msg0 ->
 3916:             {nodedown, A, B, ReasonA} = Msg0
 3917:     end,
 3918:     receive
 3919:         {nodedown, B, A, _} = Msg1 ->
 3920:             {nodedown, B, A, ReasonB} = Msg1
 3921:     end,
 3922:     ok.
 3923: 
 3924: hostname() ->
 3925:     from($@, atom_to_list(node())).
 3926: 
 3927: from(H, [H | T]) -> T;
 3928: from(H, [_ | T]) -> from(H, T);
 3929: from(_, []) -> [].
 3930: 
 3931: %% fun_spawn(Fun) ->
 3932: %%     fun_spawn(Fun, []).
 3933: 
 3934: %% fun_spawn(Fun, Args) ->
 3935: %%     spawn_link(erlang, apply, [Fun, Args]).
 3936: 
 3937: until(Fun) ->
 3938:     case Fun() of
 3939:         true ->
 3940:             ok;
 3941:         false ->
 3942:             receive after 10 -> ok end,
 3943:             until(Fun)
 3944:     end.
 3945: 
 3946: forever(Fun) ->
 3947:     Fun(),
 3948:     forever(Fun).
 3949: 
 3950: abort(Why) ->
 3951:     set_internal_state(abort, Why).
 3952: 
 3953: 
 3954: start_busy_dist_port_tracer() ->
 3955:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun () -> busy_dist_port_tracer() end),
 3956:     erlang:system_monitor(Tracer, [busy_dist_port]),
 3957:     Tracer.
 3958: 
 3959: stop_busy_dist_port_tracer(Tracer) when is_pid(Tracer) ->
 3960:     unlink(Tracer),
 3961:     exit(Tracer, bye);
 3962: stop_busy_dist_port_tracer(_) ->
 3963:     true.
 3964: 
 3965: busy_dist_port_tracer() ->
 3966:     receive
 3967:         {monitor, _SuspendedProcess, busy_dist_port, _Port} = M ->
 3968:             erlang:display(M),
 3969:             busy_dist_port_tracer()
 3970:     end.
 3971: 
 3972: repeat(_Fun, 0) ->
 3973:     ok;
 3974: repeat(Fun, N) ->
 3975:     Fun(),
 3976:     repeat(Fun, N-1).
 3977: 
 3978: string_to_atom_ext(String) ->
 3979:     Utf8List = string_to_utf8_list(String),
 3980:     Len = length(Utf8List),
 3981:     case Len < 256 of
 3982:         true ->
 3983:             [?SMALL_ATOM_UTF8_EXT, Len | Utf8List];
 3984:         false ->
 3985:             [?ATOM_UTF8_EXT, Len bsr 8, Len band 16#ff | Utf8List]
 3986:     end.
 3987: 
 3988: string_to_atom(String) ->
 3989:     binary_to_term(list_to_binary([?VERSION_MAGIC
 3990:                                    | string_to_atom_ext(String)])).
 3991: 
 3992: string_to_utf8_list([]) ->
 3993:     [];
 3994: string_to_utf8_list([CP|CPs]) when is_integer(CP),
 3995:                                    0 =< CP,
 3996:                                    CP =< 16#7F ->
 3997:     [CP | string_to_utf8_list(CPs)];
 3998: string_to_utf8_list([CP|CPs]) when is_integer(CP),
 3999:                                    16#80 =< CP,
 4000:                                    CP =< 16#7FF ->
 4001:     [16#C0 bor (CP bsr 6),
 4002:      16#80 bor (16#3F band CP)
 4003:      | string_to_utf8_list(CPs)];
 4004: string_to_utf8_list([CP|CPs]) when is_integer(CP),
 4005:                                    16#800 =< CP,
 4006:                                    CP =< 16#FFFF ->
 4007:     [16#E0 bor (CP bsr 12),
 4008:      16#80 bor (16#3F band (CP bsr 6)),
 4009:      16#80 bor (16#3F band CP)
 4010:      | string_to_utf8_list(CPs)];
 4011: string_to_utf8_list([CP|CPs]) when is_integer(CP),
 4012:                                    16#10000 =< CP,
 4013:                                    CP =< 16#10FFFF ->
 4014:     [16#F0 bor (CP bsr 18),
 4015:      16#80 bor (16#3F band (CP bsr 12)),
 4016:      16#80 bor (16#3F band (CP bsr 6)),
 4017:      16#80 bor (16#3F band CP)
 4018:      | string_to_utf8_list(CPs)].
 4019: 
 4020: mk_pid({NodeName, Creation}, Number, Serial) when is_atom(NodeName) ->
 4021:     <<?VERSION_MAGIC, NodeNameExt/binary>> = term_to_binary(NodeName),
 4022:     mk_pid({NodeNameExt, Creation}, Number, Serial);
 4023: mk_pid({NodeNameExt, Creation}, Number, Serial) ->
 4024:     case catch binary_to_term(list_to_binary([?VERSION_MAGIC,
 4025:                                               ?PID_EXT,
 4026:                                               NodeNameExt,
 4027:                                               uint32_be(Number),
 4028:                                               uint32_be(Serial),
 4029:                                               uint8(Creation)])) of
 4030:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 4031:             Pid;
 4032:         {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} ->
 4033:             exit({badarg, mk_pid, [{NodeNameExt, Creation}, Number, Serial]});
 4034:         Other ->
 4035:             exit({unexpected_binary_to_term_result, Other})
 4036:     end.
 4037: 
 4038: mk_port({NodeName, Creation}, Number) when is_atom(NodeName) ->
 4039:     <<?VERSION_MAGIC, NodeNameExt/binary>> = term_to_binary(NodeName),
 4040:     mk_port({NodeNameExt, Creation}, Number);
 4041: mk_port({NodeNameExt, Creation}, Number) ->
 4042:     case catch binary_to_term(list_to_binary([?VERSION_MAGIC,
 4043:                                               ?PORT_EXT,
 4044:                                               NodeNameExt,
 4045:                                               uint32_be(Number),
 4046:                                               uint8(Creation)])) of
 4047:         Port when is_port(Port) ->
 4048:             Port;
 4049:         {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} ->
 4050:             exit({badarg, mk_port, [{NodeNameExt, Creation}, Number]});
 4051:         Other ->
 4052:             exit({unexpected_binary_to_term_result, Other})
 4053:     end.
 4054: 
 4055: mk_ref({NodeName, Creation}, [Number] = NL) when is_atom(NodeName),
 4056:                                                  is_integer(Creation),
 4057:                                                  is_integer(Number) ->
 4058:     <<?VERSION_MAGIC, NodeNameExt/binary>> = term_to_binary(NodeName),
 4059:     mk_ref({NodeNameExt, Creation}, NL);
 4060: mk_ref({NodeNameExt, Creation}, [Number]) when is_integer(Creation),
 4061:                                                is_integer(Number) ->
 4062:     case catch binary_to_term(list_to_binary([?VERSION_MAGIC,
 4063:                                               ?REFERENCE_EXT,
 4064:                                               NodeNameExt,
 4065:                                               uint32_be(Number),
 4066:                                               uint8(Creation)])) of
 4067:         Ref when is_reference(Ref) ->
 4068:             Ref;
 4069:         {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} ->
 4070:             exit({badarg, mk_ref, [{NodeNameExt, Creation}, [Number]]});
 4071:         Other ->
 4072:             exit({unexpected_binary_to_term_result, Other})
 4073:     end;
 4074: mk_ref({NodeName, Creation}, Numbers) when is_atom(NodeName),
 4075:                                            is_integer(Creation),
 4076:                                            is_list(Numbers) ->
 4077:     <<?VERSION_MAGIC, NodeNameExt/binary>> = term_to_binary(NodeName),
 4078:     mk_ref({NodeNameExt, Creation}, Numbers);
 4079: mk_ref({NodeNameExt, Creation}, Numbers) when is_integer(Creation),
 4080:                                               is_list(Numbers) ->
 4081:     case catch binary_to_term(list_to_binary([?VERSION_MAGIC,
 4082:                                               ?NEW_REFERENCE_EXT,
 4083:                                               uint16_be(length(Numbers)),
 4084:                                               NodeNameExt,
 4085:                                               uint8(Creation),
 4086:                                               lists:map(fun (N) ->
 4087:                                                                 uint32_be(N)
 4088:                                                         end,
 4089:                                                         Numbers)])) of
 4090:         Ref when is_reference(Ref) ->
 4091:             Ref;
 4092:         {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} ->
 4093:             exit({badarg, mk_ref, [{NodeNameExt, Creation}, Numbers]});
 4094:         Other ->
 4095:             exit({unexpected_binary_to_term_result, Other})
 4096:     end.
 4097: 
 4098: uint64_be(Uint) when is_integer(Uint), 0 =< Uint, Uint < 1 bsl 64 ->
 4099:     [(Uint bsr 56) band 16#ff,
 4100:      (Uint bsr 48) band 16#ff,
 4101:      (Uint bsr 40) band 16#ff,
 4102:      (Uint bsr 32) band 16#ff,
 4103:      (Uint bsr 24) band 16#ff,
 4104:      (Uint bsr 16) band 16#ff,
 4105:      (Uint bsr 8) band 16#ff,
 4106:      Uint band 16#ff];
 4107: uint64_be(Uint) ->
 4108:     exit({badarg, uint64_be, [Uint]}).
 4109: 
 4110: uint32_be(Uint) when is_integer(Uint), 0 =< Uint, Uint < 1 bsl 32 ->
 4111:     [(Uint bsr 24) band 16#ff,
 4112:      (Uint bsr 16) band 16#ff,
 4113:      (Uint bsr 8) band 16#ff,
 4114:      Uint band 16#ff];
 4115: uint32_be(Uint) ->
 4116:     exit({badarg, uint32_be, [Uint]}).
 4117: 
 4118: 
 4119: uint16_be(Uint) when is_integer(Uint), 0 =< Uint, Uint < 1 bsl 16 ->
 4120:     [(Uint bsr 8) band 16#ff,
 4121:      Uint band 16#ff];
 4122: uint16_be(Uint) ->
 4123:     exit({badarg, uint16_be, [Uint]}).
 4124: 
 4125: uint8(Uint) when is_integer(Uint), 0 =< Uint, Uint < 1 bsl 8 ->
 4126:     Uint band 16#ff;
 4127: uint8(Uint) ->
 4128:     exit({badarg, uint8, [Uint]}).
 4129: 
 4130: free_memory() ->
 4131:     %% Free memory in MB.
 4132:     try
 4133: 	SMD = memsup:get_system_memory_data(),
 4134: 	{value, {free_memory, Free}} = lists:keysearch(free_memory, 1, SMD),
 4135: 	TotFree = (Free +
 4136: 		   case lists:keysearch(cached_memory, 1, SMD) of
 4137: 		       {value, {cached_memory, Cached}} -> Cached;
 4138: 		       false -> 0
 4139: 		   end +
 4140: 		   case lists:keysearch(buffered_memory, 1, SMD) of
 4141: 		       {value, {buffered_memory, Buffed}} -> Buffed;
 4142: 		       false -> 0
 4143: 		   end),
 4144: 	TotFree div (1024*1024)
 4145:     catch
 4146: 	error : undef ->
 4147: 	    ct:fail({"os_mon not built"})
 4148:     end.
